content: श्वसनः [श्वसित्यनेन श्वस्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Air, wind; श्वसनसुरभिगंधिः <ls>Śi. 11. 21.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon killed by Indra. --नं {@--1@} Breath, breathing, respiration; श्वसनचलितपल्लवाधरोष्ठे <ls>Ki. 10. 34</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 2. 4</ls> (where it has sense 1 also); <ls>Śi. 9. 52.</ls> {@--2@} Sighing.
